title: Lily Allen playfully offers to PAY fans to promote her songs as she teases the new release
text:
She's just a day away from the release of her new music.

But Lily Allen has already offered to pay some of her fans to promote her tracks, as she took to Instagram to share a sultry topless video on Wednesday as she relaxed in the bath.

The singer, 34, wrote in a series of text posts that she'll transfer some cash to her followers if they 'hawk' her music, but joked that they're going to be 'sick of the teasing' ahead of the music's release on Friday.

Sexy: Lily Allen, 34. has playfully offered to pay fans to promote her music as she went topless in a sultry bath post

In a series of posts, Lily confirmed to fans that the release of her music was just two days away.

She wrote: 'I have a song coming out on Friday so brace yourselves for some tedious promotional teasers.

'I am gonna ram this s**t down your damn phone throats. You're gonna be so sick of the teasing you're gonna have to stream it, in the hope that the promotion will stop.'

Funny: The singer is set to release her new music on Friday, and wrote that since she didn't have any 'influencer friends' she wanted to use fans to promote her music

Exciting: In the first post Lily teased the long-awaited release of her new music on Friday, as she warned fans about the 'tedious' promotion that was to come

Naughty: She joked that the promotions were going to come and thick and fast on her social media

Fed up: Lily also told her fans that they would soon grow tired of the endless teases for her new music

Lily then made the playful suggestion that perhaps her fans could promote her new songs, after joking that she didn't have an 'influencer friends' that she could call on for help.

She wrote: 'Also I'm gonna pay my influencer friends a s**t ton of money to promote the hell out of it too.

'Actually I don't have any of those kind of friends but hey, if you want some money to hawk my music send me your Paypal and I'll get the digital assets over to you.'

It is not clear whether Lily was joking or being serious in her suggestion.

Plug her tracks! The Not Fair hitmaker also said that she was going to pay her influencer friends 'a s**t ton of money' to promote her new songs

Cashing in: But Lily then suggested that some of her followers could promote her music, though it is not clear whether she is joking

Following the series of posts, Lily also put on a sultry display as she relaxed in the bath, and appeared to go topless as she enjoyed the relaxing dip.

As she struck a series of playful poses for the camera, the Carly Simon track You're So Vain could be heard playing the background.

This comes amid rumours that Lily is dating Stranger Things star Davie Harbour, as the pair have been romantically linked following several outings together.

The pair were on hand to watch the contest between heavyweight Alexander Povetkin and Hughie Fury last month, with sources claiming they left the O2 arm in arm shortly afterwards.

Sizzling: Lily then took to Instagram Stories to share a sultry bathroom video, as she went topless for the relaxing dip

Little more than three weeks earlier they were seen together in London's West End, where they took in a show at Piccadilly Theatre - an appearance that immediately suggested Lily has moved on following her split with grime DJ MC Meridian Dan.

Lily separated from husband Sam Cooper in 2015 after about four years marriage. The former couple announced they finalised their divorce in 2018.

They each share joint custody of their two children: daughters Ethel, seven, and Marnie, six.
